author: __flcl
content:
We want to update the EL and send blob tool, so just to double check:
1. tx sender should form a tx in mempool form, where we have in addition to payload: 
  - 1 byte of proofs version = 0x02 (version field is absent for previous proofs, and only 0x02 is correct when present)
  - blobs - regular blobs of 128KiB in size, 
  - commitments - plain old commitments for every blob
  - cell proofs for every cell of erasure coding of blob, 128 cells/extblob

author: __flcl
content: 2. EL should propagate TXs in the same form

author: __flcl
content:
3. engine_getblobsv2 responds with:
   - blobs - regular blobs of 128KiB in size, 
   - cell proofs for every cell of erasure coding of blob, 128 cells/extblob

author: __flcl
content:
4. when EL receives TX it should restore cells using ComputeCells and then verify proofs using ckzg's VerifyCellKzgProofBatch
(~~it receives cells, commitments, proofs, but I see no method that converts blobs to cells without proof computation in the API~~, cc: <@592004585506340885>  oh I see it exists in version 2.1! Not an issue now cc <@334704997122179072> )
